resources.string: Please read to the migrant:\n\nMany Nepali people who go overseas for employment end up being exploited. They are tricked, cheated, seldom get the promised salary, forced to work in difficult conditions, beaten, tortured, and sexually abused. Many end up in prison in foreign countries or commit suicide. This app is designed to help Nepali people seeking overseas work to avoid being deceived or exploited, and to find safe and prosperous employment. Following the steps laid out in this app will increase the chances of you having a safe foreign employment experience, however, we cannot guarantee that this will happen every time.

Many Nepali people who go overseas for employment end up being exploited. They are tricked, cheated, seldom get the promised salary, forced to work in difficult conditions, beaten, tortured, and sexually abused. Many end up in prison in foreign countries or commit suicide. This app is designed to help Nepali people seeking overseas work to avoid being deceived or exploited, and to find safe and prosperous employment. Following the steps laid out in this app will increase the chances of you having a safe foreign employment experience, however, we cannot guarantee that this will happen every time.

If you have completed the Preparation section, please agree to not change the previous answers. If you have to change your answers please go back and do it now, otherwise please check "I agree to not change my answers".
You won\'t be able to change your answers
We are sending an SMS with a code to your phone number. Please enter it below. It may take up to 1 minute
Are you sure you want to delete migrant?
How did this section of the app help you?
Please be patient, You should receive the code in about 1 minute.
Are you sure your destination is
Please understand that going for foreign employment if you are under 18 is illegal.
Please check one and help us improve
Enter the number that you registered
This section is complete, would you like to move on to the next section?
Choose the country you are planning to go to
Check if you are fully prepared
Check if you are ready to travel

SaFE was developed by Tiny Hands Nepal, an NGO dedicated to fighting Nepal\'s greatest injustices. THN has been working in Nepal since 2005 and has helped prevent over 15,000 Nepali citizens from being trafficked into modern day slavery. This app was designed in light of our extensive experience and with your well-being in mind
Why do I need to use this app?
How do I find a good manpower agency?
Can I use an agent? (Is it safe to use an agent?)
Why do you need my contact information?
What are the red flags I\'m seeing?
What does the help button do?
How do I advance from the Preparation section to the Travel section?
If I don\'t reach 100% completion for the Preparation section, what happens?
This app will help you protect yourself from becoming a victim of fraud, human trafficking, and/or human smuggling while you pursue foreign employment.

You can find a manpower agency in newspapers, navigating to the DOFE website (www.bit.ly/dofenepal) and on job listing websites such as www.baideshikrojgari.com. If the the agency has an active registration and status then you should feel free to use them. You can determine the status by visiting the DoFE website specifically. If the manpower agency provides you with a demand letter, a LOT NUMBER (LT NO) and sense workers overseas then you can generally trust they are reliable.
No, It is not safe to use an agent for foreign employment unless he/she has a valid license from DOFE. If you use an agent your cost will be and chance of exploitation high.
Your contact information allows us to contact you if we notice any potential problems or red flags with your migration plans. If there is a chance your safety is at risk we want to let you know

The red flags represent potential problems or areas of risk with your migration plan. Those might be problems based on our vast experience with human trafficking and exploitation, or government regulations and requirements.
By clicking the help button you will be connected to one of our Nepali staff immediately. It will then be their priority to make sure you receive the help you need

Once you complete the Preparation section with all of the information you have available and are ready to purchase your tickets for travel, then click on the Travel icon on the main app screen. You will be asked if you are sure you want to advance. By clicking yes, you agree to not go back and edit your responses. You will then be able to complete the Travel section.
Reaching 100% completion is important, but not required to advance to the Travel section. Reaching 100% will ensure we have the most accurate and complete information to assist you with your plans.
If you are being helped by someone, enter the helpers\' name below.
of the questions, are you sure you want to proceed?
